amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new title establishing a "Truman" investigative committee to protect against waste, fraud, and abuse related to contracts for the global war on terrorism and Hurricanes Katrina and Rita rebuilding efforts.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Kaptur amendment (A044). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
